headline: Higher Beef Prices Are Here: Best Steakhouse Stocks for 2026
summary: Beef prices are set to stay high into 2026. Here’s how Darden, Texas Roadhouse, and Bloomin’ Brands stack up for investors

headline: Darden Gears Up to Post Q2 Earnings: Here's What You Must Know
summary: DRI is set to report Q2 FY26 earnings on Dec. 18. EPS is projected at $2.10, with Olive Garden and LongHorn expected to lead revenue growth amid cost pressure.

headline: Jim Cramer Says Olive Garden “Is Crushing It” and So Is Darden Stock
summary: Darden Restaurants, Inc. (NYSE:DRI) is one of the stocks on Jim Cramer’s game plan this week. Cramer noted Olive Garden’s “minimal beef exposure” during the episode as he stated: “Next up, I like Thursday. headline: Should Darden’s Steady Same-Store Sales And EPS Growth Reinforce Confidence For Darden Restaurants (DRI) Investors?
summary: Darden Restaurants recently delivered another quarter of steady same-restaurant sales growth above 3% and ongoing double-digit earnings-per-share gains, reinforcing its fiscal 2026 guidance. Analysts highlighted that this consistency, combined with management’s reaffirmed outlook, has reinforced confidence in Darden’s ability to sustain operational discipline despite cost pressures. We’ll now examine how this dependable same-restaurant sales growth shapes Darden Restaurants’ investment...
